content: The museum will be closed due to typhoons or stormy weather, or the business hours and contents may be changed depending on various circumstances.
If the museum is closed by the opening time due to stormy weather or other circumstances, all tickets for that day will be canceled. In that case, no cancellation fee will be charged.
Please refrain from smoking outside the smoking areas in the museum.
Please refrain from collecting plants and insects from the museum.
Please do not enter the bushes or flower beds as it may cause injury or accidents.
Please ask for prior permission for photography, commercial activities, advertising, etc.
